resources.string: A three-digit code on your credit card, you can find this on the back of your card.
Please contact your bank for more details, or try adding a different payment method
You should be able to find this date on the front of your card, under your card number.
You can\'t find this on the card. It is a 4 digit security pin to authorised card transactions.\nYou might have to contact your bank if you\'ve forgotten the pin
One time verification password sent from your bank to your registered mobile number to verify transaction
